sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-data-table :headers="headers" :items="items">
         <template v-slot:item.actions="{ item }">
            <v-icon @click="$emit('edit', item)">mdi-pencil</v-icon>
            <v-icon @click="$emit('delete', item.id)">mdi-delete</v-icon>
        </template>
    </v-data-table>
    
</template>

<script setup>
 const items = [
     {
        name: 'African',
        species: 'Loxodonta',
        diet: 'Herbivore',
        habitat: 'Savanna'
    }
        
 ]
</script>
